summary: Mozilla Firefox Nightly 62.0a1 (2018-05-10) always starts in windowed/non-maximized mode

comments.author: mr.rubot@gmail.com

comments.text: *** Bug 1460689 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
comments.author: Virtual@teknik.io

comments.text:
Looking on Mozilla Firefox Nightly 62.0a1 (2018-05-10) daily pushlog,
these bugs seems most suspicious:
- Bug 1453788 - Remember window size and location for chrome HTML windows
- Bug 1460116 - Remove ShouldHideScrollbars
- Bug 1457338 - Tap in tab strip stops mouse drags

or it's missed call?
comments.author: Virtual@teknik.io

comments.text: Pretty sure this is from my patch, I'll look into it.
comments.author: bdahl@mozilla.com

comments.text:
After manually testing the issue I found the following: 

Last good version: Nightly 62.0a1 – Build ID: 20180509100510 – (2018-05-09)
First bad version: Nightly 62.0a1 – Build ID:  20180510100205 – (2018-05-10)
comments.author: timea.babos@softvision.ro

comments.text:
(In reply to Timea Babos from comment #4)
> After manually testing the issue I found the following: 
> 
> Last good version: Nightly 62.0a1 – Build ID: 20180509100510 – (2018-05-09)
> First bad version: Nightly 62.0a1 – Build ID:  20180510100205 – (2018-05-10)

Good, but this is already written in bug summary ;)
comments.author: Virtual@teknik.io

comments.text: Since this has an assignee and we'll see it in regression triage, I don't think we need to specially track it.
comments.author: lhenry@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Created attachment 8976629
Bug 1460639 - Apply persisted window settings before layout.

Previously, with early first paint enabled, nsXULWindow incorrectly loaded the
persisted window settings from about:blank and would only load them once.
Instead, load the settings before starting layout.

Review commit: https://reviewboard.mozilla.org/r/244712/diff/#index_header
See other reviews: https://reviewboard.mozilla.org/r/244712/
comments.author: bdahl@mozilla.com

comments.text: I'm also working on a test, but running into intermittent failures do to the way persist values are stored on a timer.
comments.author: bdahl@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Comment on attachment 8976629
Bug 1460639 - Apply persisted window settings before layout.

https://reviewboard.mozilla.org/r/244712/#review250844
comments.author: bugs@pettay.fi

comments.text: this code seems to be very regression prone, so it would be great to get some good tests.

comments.text: I'm confirming that bug is fixed, starting in Mozilla Firefox Nightly 62.0a1 (2018-05-25), so I'm marking this bug as VERIFIED. Thank you very much! \o/
comments.author: Virtual@teknik.io

comments.text:
I have always the problem with last version 62.0a1 (2018-05-24) (64-bit) Xubuntu 18.04 LTS x64
Problem not fixed
comments.author: florent.lagoda@univ-rennes2.fr

comments.text:
(In reply to comment #21)
> I have always the problem with last version 62.0a1 (2018-05-24)

The lastest build is 2018-05-26. If Nightly cannot update itself, download manually here:

http://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/nightly/latest-mozilla-central/
comments.author: mtanalin@yandex.ru

comments.text:
(In reply to Florent from comment #21)
> I have always the problem with last version 62.0a1 (2018-05-24) (64-bit)
> Xubuntu 18.04 LTS x64
> Problem not fixed

If you would read my comment #20, you will understand properly that this bug:
- is fixed starting in Mozilla Firefox Nightly 62.0a1 (2018-05-25)
- is not fixed in in Mozilla Firefox Nightly 62.0a1 (2018-05-24).
comments.author: Virtual@teknik.io
